rules_text:
[i](As a Conquest enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, put it onto the battlefield transformed.)[/i]
When Battle for Prospera Depths enters the battlefield,
create three 0/1 green Kelp creature tokens with “{T}: Add {G}.”
rules_text2:
{T}: Add {G}.
{4}{G}{G}, {T}: Creatures you control have base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
